price: او لمر او سپوږمۍ يې درته په كار لګولي چې له قانون سره سم چليږي او (همدارنګه) شپه او ورځ يې په كار درته لګولي.
arabic: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ دَآئِبَيۡنِۖ وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wasakhara lakumu al-shamsa wal-qamara dāibayni wasakhara lakumu al-layla wal-nahāra
